title: Not able to build lodestar from source

labels.name: prio-high
labels.description: Resolve issues as soon as possible.

body:
**Describe the bug**

Got this error if I build lodestar from source from a contabo vpss machine:

```
  ACTION binding_gyp_kzg_target_build_blst /root/lodestar/node_modules/c-kzg/libblst.a
+ cc -O2 -fno-builtin -fPIC -Wall -Wextra -Werror -D__ADX__ -mno-avx -c /root/lodestar/node_modules/c-kzg/dist/deps/blst/src/server.c
+ cc -O2 -fno-builtin -fPIC -Wall -Wextra -Werror -D__ADX__ -mno-avx -c /root/lodestar/node_modules/c-kzg/dist/deps/blst/build/assembly.S
+ ar rc libblst.a assembly.o server.o
  ACTION binding_gyp_kzg_target_build_ckzg /root/lodestar/node_modules/c-kzg/c_kzg_4844.o
/root/lodestar/node_modules/c-kzg/dist/deps/c-kzg/c_kzg_4844.c: In function ‘load_trusted_setup’:
/root/lodestar/node_modules/c-kzg/dist/deps/c-kzg/c_kzg_4844.c:779:3: warning: ignoring return value of ‘fscanf’, declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Wunused-result]
   fscanf(in, "%" SCNu64, &i);
   ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/root/lodestar/node_modules/c-kzg/dist/deps/c-kzg/c_kzg_4844.c:781:3: warning: ignoring return value of ‘fscanf’, declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Wunused-result]
   fscanf(in, "%" SCNu64, &i);
   ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/root/lodestar/node_modules/c-kzg/dist/deps/c-kzg/c_kzg_4844.c:791:7: warning: ignoring return value of ‘fscanf’, declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Wunused-result]
       fscanf(in, "%2hhx", &c[j]);
       ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/root/lodestar/node_modules/c-kzg/dist/deps/c-kzg/c_kzg_4844.c:798:7: warning: ignoring return value of ‘fscanf’, declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Wunused-result]
       fscanf(in, "%2hhx", &c[j]);
       ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/kzg/kzg.o
  SOLINK_MODULE(target) Release/obj.target/kzg.node
/usr/bin/ld: /root/lodestar/node_modules/c-kzg/c_kzg_4844.o: relocation R_X86_64_PC32 against symbol `bytes_to_g1' can not be used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC
/usr/bin/ld: final link failed: Bad value
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
kzg.target.mk:186: recipe for target 'Release/obj.target/kzg.node' failed
make: Leaving directory '/root/lodestar/node_modules/c-kzg/build'
make: *** [Release/obj.target/kzg.node] Error 1
gyp ERR! build error
gyp ERR! stack Error: `make` failed with exit code: 2
gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.onExit (/root/lodestar/node_modules/node-gyp/lib/build.js:194:23)
gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.emit (node:events:394:28)
gyp ERR! stack     at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (node:internal/child_process:290:12)
gyp ERR! System Linux 4.15.0-140-generic
gyp ERR! command "/root/.nvm/versions/node/v16.4.2/bin/node" "/root/lodestar/node_modules/.bin/node-gyp" "rebuild"
gyp ERR! cwd /root/lodestar/node_modules/c-kzg
```

This happens only after we merge eip4844 PRs, specifically c-kg dependency

**Expected behavior**

No error
